MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Llandyrnog and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.47AM. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.29PM on 5th November 2020.
